title: Clean Excel Data
description: Automatically organize messy data by splitting and reformatting columns
prompt:
I'll help you split the names in Column C into separate First Name and Last Name columns. Let me analyze and modify your spreadsheet:

1. First, I'll check the current structure of your spreadsheet
2. Then I'll create a script to:
   - Read the full names from Column C
   - Split each name into first and last components
   - Keep the first name in Column C
   - Add the last names in Column D
3. Finally, I'll save the changes back to your file

Please provide the path to your Excel file and I'll help you split the names.
example:
For a spreadsheet containing:
Column C (Name)
John Smith
Jane Doe

Will be split into:
Column C (First Name) | Column D (Last Name)
John                  | Smith
Jane                  | Doe
author: GooseAI Team

worksheet_name.description: Name of the worksheet containing the data (optional - will use first worksheet if not specified)
